snippet.title: ATOM RPG - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/552620/ATOM_RPG_Postapocalyptic_indie_game/
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/atomrpg/atom-rpg
Official Website: http://atomrpg.com

In-game trailer for an upcoming post-apocalyptic role playing game, set in the remnants of the Soviet Union - ATOM RPG. Available for Linux, Mac OSX, and Windows.

For more updates make sure to visit us at:

Facebook: https://facebook.com/atomrpg

Twitter: https://twitter.com/atomrpg

Instagram: https://instagram.com/atomrpg

This game is not yet rated.
